mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectPrmFeeEventAplGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FEE_EVENT_SN , APL_GOD_NO , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM PRM_FEE_EVENT_APL_GOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND FEE_EVENT_SN = #{feeEventSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND APL_GOD_NO = #{aplGodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
